name: MARS: YEAR ONE
description:
An arcade style 2D top-down shooter set on the red planet. Survive an onslaught of alien scum. If you can’t, take as many of them with you as you can.

Set in the year 2056, years after the human race set up terraforming stations on Mars to make the atmosphere habitable, the first civilian colony is nearly instantly attacked upon arrival by an unknown
species that has been laying dormant underground for an age.

Utilize the maneuverability, bullets and rockets of your ship to exterminate any and all hostile aircraft.
